segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar with such determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so focused on his mission, it's almost surprising.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool is wobbling, and it makes me feel surprised that he hasn't fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so close to the edge, and I can't help but feel surprised he's managed to stay balanced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him seems so eager, waiting for her share of the cookies, and it's surprising how patient she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, sneaking cookies when the adult is distracted, and it's surprising how well they work together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balance is so precarious, it's surprising he hasn't toppled over yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he manages to get the cookies without falling, and it's surprising how determined he is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's anticipation is palpable, and it's surprising how focused she is on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a sense of surprise, wondering if they'll get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR
